metadata.title: Zara vs Snitch vs Zudio: Fashion Industry Deep Dive
metadata.description:
Mastersâ€™ Union students visited @SNITCH_OFFICIAL headquarters in Bangalore as part of our #OffCampus initiative and learned how to build a fashion brand in India!

Our students got the opportunity to interact with Siddharth Dungarwal, Founder of SNITCH, who shared insights on how the fashion industry works, and how breaking the traditional patterns of business helped him scale the business in a relatively short time.

Our students also learned how to position a fashion brand, optimize the supply
